setUseLocalhost

public void setUseLocalhost(boolean useLocalhost)
Directs the factory to create TcpDestinations using "localhost." By default the factory will not do this since the use of this InetAddress from another machine will not result in a connection back to the machine the TcpDestination was created from.

setUseEphemeralPort

public void setUseEphemeralPort(boolean useEphemeralPort)

Directs the factory to create TcpDestinations indicating that the port number is dynamic. It does this by setting the port to -1. This is actually the default if the port number isn't set using setPort().

This is meant to be used from a DI container and set as a property. The value passed doesn't actually do anything. To use a fixed port call setPort which will undo this setting.

setPort

public void setPort(int port)
Directs the factory to create TcpDestinations providing the given port number.
